Montague Ave. North Charleston, SC (843) 377-8884 Where Awesomeness Lives More than your typical Ax throwing venue, we have a golf simulator, retro video games embedded in the bar top, pool/billiards, foosball, pinball, skeeball, Karaoke every Friday night, live music, and an extensive drink menu including many non-alcoholic options. From first dates to large corporate parties, we have you covered. Our Ax targets are the best in the state and our coaches will have you hitting bullseyes in no time! Charleston's only 5.0✪ Google rating entertainment venue!
